SOCOM Wood Camouflage Bandolier
kDesc
Handy when you need more machine gun ammo in the woods. [#Legal]
Pratique pour transporter plus de munitions de mitrailleuse dans la forêt. [#Legal]
Praktisch, wenn Sie in den Wäldern mehr MG-Munition benötigen. [#Legal]
Utile quando ti servono ulteriori munizioni nella foresta. [#Legal]
Útil cuando necesitas más munición de ametralladora en el bosque. [#Legal]
森林地帯において、機関銃の予備弾薬を持ち運ぶのに有用。[#Legal]
야전에서 더 많은 탄약을 소지할 수 있도록 지급되는 탄띠.[#Legal]
Handy when you need more machine gun ammo in the woods.[#Legal]
可以讓您在叢林中攜帶更多機槍彈藥的背帶。[#Legal]
可以讓您在叢林中攜帶更多機槍彈藥的背帶。[#Legal]
Handy when you need more machine gun ammo in the woods. [#Legal]
